summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5603 for the improvement of Hudson Street, from Corson Avenue to a point 120 feet west of Agnew Avenue, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 73747, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
